This is the introductory vignette

```{r setup}
library(VDPO)
```

In a r-markdown document, we can create code chunks

```{r}
x <- 1:10
mean(x)
```

The result is shown below the code block. We can also show plots:
```{r}
plot(1:10, 11:20)
```

Rendering the document is as easy as clicking the knit buttom.
